c1.name: Six Paths of Sage Silkcraft
c1.descriptionRaw:
The AoE of the automaton doll "Tamoto" summoned by <color=#FFD780FF>Fluttering Hasode</color> is increased by 50%.
Additionally, if there is a <color=#FFE699FF>Geo</color> party member other than Chiori, Fluttering Hasode will trigger the following after the dash is completed:
路 Summon an additional Tamoto. Only one additional Tamoto can exist at the same time, whether summoned by Chiori this way or through the presence of a Geo Construct.
路 Triggers the Ascension Talent "The Finishing Touch." You must first unlock the Ascension Talent "The Finishing Touch."
c1.description:
The AoE of the automaton doll "Tamoto" summoned by Fluttering Hasode is increased by 50%.
Additionally, if there is a Geo party member other than Chiori, Fluttering Hasode will trigger the following after the dash is completed:
路 Summon an additional Tamoto. Only one additional Tamoto can exist at the same time, whether summoned by Chiori this way or through the presence of a Geo Construct.
路 Triggers the Ascension Talent "The Finishing Touch." You must first unlock the Ascension Talent "The Finishing Touch."

c2.name: In Five Colors Dyed
c2.descriptionRaw:
For 10s after using <color=#FFD780FF>Hiyoku: Twin Blades</color>, a simplified automaton doll, "Kinu," will be summoned next to your active character every 3s. Kinu will attack nearby opponents, dealing <color=#FFE699FF>AoE Geo DMG</color> equivalent to 170% of Tamoto's DMG. DMG dealt this way is considered Elemental Skill DMG.
Kinu will leave the field after 1 attack or after lasting 3s.
c2.description:
For 10s after using Hiyoku: Twin Blades, a simplified automaton doll, "Kinu," will be summoned next to your active character every 3s. Kinu will attack nearby opponents, dealing AoE Geo DMG equivalent to 170% of Tamoto's DMG. DMG dealt this way is considered Elemental Skill DMG.
Kinu will leave the field after 1 attack or after lasting 3s.

c3.name: Four Brocade Embellishments
c3.descriptionRaw:
Increases the Level of <color=#FFD780FF>Fluttering Hasode</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.
c3.description:
Increases the Level of Fluttering Hasode by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c4.name: A Tailor's Three Courtesies
c4.descriptionRaw:
For 8s after triggering either follow-up effect of the Ascension Talent "Tailor-Made," when your current active character's Normal, Charged, or Plunging Attacks hit a nearby opponent, a simplified automaton doll, "Kinu," will be summoned near this opponent. You can summon 1 Kinu every 1s in this way, and up to 3 Kinu may be summoned this way during each instance of "Tailor-Made"'s Seize the Moment or Tailoring effect. The above effect can be triggered up to once every 15s.
You must first unlock the Ascension Talent "Tailor-Made."

The above effect can be triggered up to once every 15s.
You must first unlock the Ascension Talent "Tailor-Made."

c5.name: Two Silken Plumules
c5.descriptionRaw:
Increases the Level of <color=#FFD780FF>Hiyoku: Twin Blades</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.
c5.description:
Increases the Level of Hiyoku: Twin Blades by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c6.name: Sole Principle Pursuit
c6.descriptionRaw:
After triggering a follow-up effect of the Ascension Talent "Tailor-Made," Chiori's own <color=#FFD780FF>Fluttering Hasode</color>'s CD is decreased by 12s. You must first unlock the Ascension Talent "Tailor-Made.".
In addition, the DMG dealt by Chiori's own Normal Attacks is increased by an amount equal to 235% of her own DEF.
